channel.title: Shiny on viz.
channel.description: Recent content in Shiny on viz.

item.title: R&D Investment Dashboard
item.description: The JRC annualy publishes the top R&D investing firms. This dashboard helps to explore the 2017 dataset.

item.title: Community Map (WIP)
item.description: The Austrian Digitisation Agency commissioned a stakeholder mapping of actors pushing digitisation forward in Austria. The Community Map, a Shiny app, shows data collected from a snowballing survey in which key actors identified their main partners and provided information about their R&D, business and data sharing links.

item.title: Seats in the European Parliament
item.description: With the UK leaving the EU, 73 MEPs leave the Parliament. The distribution of these seats matters for Europe. Find out about the proposals and explore your own distribution
